review.title: “Looks good from the outside”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly environment. Employees are always friendly.Stay here after 3 months and check out the perks!!! Can't say what it is but wow!!!
review.cons: Cons – Small cubicles if you like that stuff.Benefits are really bad for a $20m+ company.Elevators can take up to a couple minutes just for a 12 floor building. Stairs are faster at times.Good luck getting recognition.
